item.title: Golang lessons
item.description: Starting point The first lesson/meeting will be on Monday 21st of September 2020! Stream/lesson Schedule Monday: 19:00 GMT - Plan the week Tuesday: Q/A Whenever I am live Wednesday: Q/A Whenever I am live Thursday: Q/A Whenever I am live Friday: 19:00 GMT - Code reviews and Pull Requests Saturday: Q/A Whenever I am live Sunday: Deep dive into random golang things (more information later) What are we doing.

item.title: What is this website for ?
item.description:
This website is for whatever, whenever, when we feel like it.
Love, Z.

item.title: This is a website
item.description:
This website is an engineering wonder that has been in the making for YEARS. It is the best website, it has the best divs. I would also like to add that this website has is not in collusion with anyone.
Love, Z.
